column3: Tonaxia would pay a debt of kindness.

The sylphs of Little Solace are fond of Rolfe Hawthorne, who has been a friend to their people. Tonaxia would repay the man's kindness with an offering of forest fronds from this year's bountiful harvest. Take them and decorate Hawthorne Hut as per Tonaxia's directions.
You have decked the hut with forest fronds as Tonaxia requested. Speak with Rolfe Hawthorne, who is sure to be overjoyed at the surprise gift.
Though taking issue with nature of the gift and the means of delivery, Rolfe is nevertheless pleased at the kindness of his forest friends. Inform Tonaxia that the deed is done.
Tonaxia is delighted to hear of Rolfe's joy and frustration both. It would seem the troublesome nature of the “gift” was exactly as the mischievous sylph intended.
Place the vegetable offerings around Hawthorne Hut.
Walking one at thatch-roof is always kind to these ones. This one would repay walking one's kindness.
These ones harvested many forest fronds this year, so many that these ones cannot store them all! This one would not be wasteful one.
This one would decorate thatch-roof with forest-fruits, make thatch-roof pretty place! But this one is busy one. Would kind one go in this one's place?
Blast! Well, I'll be, they've done it again! ...Hm?
What's that? It was <Emphasis>you</Emphasis> who “decorated” my home with overgrown weeds at the sylphs' request? <sigh>...
Look, I appreciate the sentiment, but I'd appreciate it a fair sight more if the next gift from our forest friends was delivered straight to my doorstep...and was actually edible, at that.
Decorate thatch-roof with forest fronds, and let walking one know that this is gift from these ones. This one is thankful to walking one!
Walking one wants next gift delivered to doorstep? But what would be the fun in that? Tee-hee!
